Reviews.Title: “Ideal location, budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: Traspin Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed days ago wasnt ritz price paid adequate head day climbing spiral staircase funny drinks double overlooked canals lovely hustle bustle outside window bit served purpose clean towels changed 3 night stay nice own bathroom navigate past toilet sink shower pretty squashed reception staff helpfulfriendly 24hours breakfast pretty pants option breadtoast toaster cheese ham boiled eggs orange juice coffee definitely stay looking prices trip book enjoy stay 5 star accommodation book 5 star accommodation

Reviews.Title: “Review of Vijaya Hotel Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel wasnt impressed settle stuff cosy bed comfortable partner stunning view overlooking canal lovely look onto hotel staff friendly willing offer advice comforting staying hotel location brilliant shops coffee shops red light district central station etc

Reviews.Title: “Location”
Reviews.Author: Gary W Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel excellent location value money recommend time hotel 7 breakfast ok continental breakfasts chimes church bells sometimes wake ensure drink smoke sleep

Reviews.Title: “Liudmila”
Reviews.Author: Lyudmila M Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: expected close cenral station nice canal view private clean bathroom floor noisy bar friday saturday night impossible sleep incredibly loud music bar closed late midnight hotel chaged card 75 euros booked online 2 days arrivel checkin payed cash 75 euros told hotel garantee refund 30 days dont understand garantee payed left stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Bargain!!”
Reviews.Author: B G Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: location hotel honest overlooked canal couldnt greeted friendliest receptionist impressed staff throughout fault hotel clean bit shabby datedthe bathroom bedroom spotless beds changed daily wasnt stretch excellent steep winding staircase amsterdam allthe buildings ate tall breakfast juice definitely canal view

Reviews.Title: “Significantly Below Average”
Reviews.Author: liambr
Reviews.Content: visited hotel recently dissapointed checking paying arrival trekked rickety staircases soiled carpets flights stairs arrived nice view cold dank covers dirty moth eaten grotty bathroom nice owners pay attention detail whatsoever lots tiny expect 21st century hotel missing credit staff friendly offer help

Reviews.Title: “basic hotel with a good location in amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Sydney_Aussie21
Reviews.Content: unfortunately booked accommodation 1 week accommodation pretty hard hotel managed 1 bedroom 3 single beds booked accommodation 210 eu night 420 eu 2 nights cheaper book advance hotel pretty close amsterdam terminal amsterdam airport 20 mins amsterdam train terminal hotel 1015 min walk alright hotel theres desk reception wasnt available free leave luggage wall people left luggages paid accommodation online booking doesnt charge credit card assume didnt check hotel using cc charge extra annoying originally 3 single beds bed fine 2 single beds dont 3rd bed anyway ok kettle wasnt included shower tube soap dont expect provide shower amenities beds ok river hear resturants forth wasnt issue stay breakfast basically theres downstairs reception table food supplied bread boiled eggs meat slices bread butter nutella strawberry jams location hotel central district road infamous red light district bridge hotel walk chinatown overall hotel ok price book alot earlier gone hotel breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Very Good”
Reviews.Author: Paul J
Reviews.Content: april 2011 location centre action adequate shower toilet bathroom cleaned everyday fresh owls cosy looked canel near pubs loud hey amsterdam didnt bother staff ok maps etc isnt hotel price moan returning

Reviews.Title: “Good location, lousy staff.”
Reviews.Author: Stuart L
Reviews.Content: stayed recently usual hotel central location nice basic freshly decorated reasonably comfy bed ordinary breakfast bread cold meat cheese etc guy desk sarcastic unhelpful pain backside joking arrived reservation kept pretence annoyed customer service obviously priority staying

Reviews.Title: “Avoid!”
Reviews.Author: Nikki A
Reviews.Content: dont start awful hotel maybe plus quicker saythe location superb edge red light district thats plus guy reception cold unfriendly top narrow stairs fine awkward elderly peoplethe bigger stairs window hanging tried looked dangerous looked couldve fallen onto boyfriend spoke reception told look itif happened window filled smell curry permanently due indian restaurant hotel curry smell filling nostrils particularly woken fan figured dangerous window closed help curry smell august hot close looked hadnt cleaned time wouldnt risk getting showered dust closer look insects sitting presumed dead woke bites arms cant visited chemist home informed mosquito bites yes hotel cheap amsterdam standards international standards pay ive stayed cheap hotels hostels world am happy basic sleep compared cheap appalling decent size bed comfortable bathroom fine dont expect insects filthy fan bites arms staying unhelpful staff dangerous window couldve seriously injured

Reviews.Title: “A VERY DEPRESSING EXPERIENCE”
Reviews.Author: float223
Reviews.Content: recently 3 night stay gobsmacked price 120 euros night triple entering reception told 3 times whilst receptionist sat phone ignoring 10 minutes nice welcome walked labyrinth stairs corridors piles toilet paper boxes decorating gear god carpets seen vac entering overpowering stench bleach mates commented bads happened chuckle tried light wed price looking grease grime smeared walls central heating pipes hanging walls windows bolted odd bits rotting wood hard feel breakfast basically tray cheese tray ham loaf bread guy toastie barked warming id decorate house free ripped hand threw onto machine left unbelievable noise street 2am starting 730am youve gone relaxing break aint gonna probably worst hotels ive stayed ive blackpool lad price id look avoid

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: passenger_10
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location parallel street red light district 450 meters central station arrival reception calculate additional 15 euros explained restaurant reception morning sometimes difficult breakfast clean bit noisy night hotel travelers dont spend lot money

Reviews.Title: “good budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: adeappo
Reviews.Content: mates stayed nites bed room2 singles bunk lots space view dated clean fresh towels everydaythe bathroom huge hotel edge red light nr stay

Reviews.Title: “Good for a night or two.”
Reviews.Author: janicamachado
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel sister night twin ensuite bathroom breakfast included positive red light district ambience location nice view canal street noisy expected staff helpful breakfast fresh choose breakfast bathroom clean bathroom spacious beds comfy negative stuff hallways filthy hotel labyrinth help found twin looks corridor bit hot night little fan nightstand meant couldnâ´t tv plug donâ´t tv free internet included slow toilet flush wierd noises 15 min fill 2 towels shower pressure didnâ´t shelf stuff taking shower shampoo shower gel etc shower floor payed hear low budget hotels amsterdam poor conditions itâ´s couple nights bed sleep returning amsterdam stay

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Karen154945
Reviews.Content: clean overall decor tired tad priced prepared walk narrow steep winding staircases centrally located red light district walking distance local tourist attractions reception friendly breakfast worth extra money paid lots street noise night hey amsterdam stay days

Reviews.Title: “Probably unlikely to find a nicer budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: TillieNat
Reviews.Content: friends bit wary staying described star mixed reviews pleasantly surprised decor wasnt amazing paid impressed bathroom cleaned daily comfortable beds reception friendly didnt hotel middle red light district didnt noise unsafe isnt issue dam square station lot main tourist attractions van gogh anne frank museums canal shattered walking breakfast basic filling found rolls particularly useful hold lunchtime definitely stay recommend cheap friendly stay

Reviews.Title: “great location! but only good for 1 night!”
Reviews.Author: TarynF
Reviews.Content: hotel location basicly red light district double nice bit noisy hear street ensuite bathroom tiny person fit inside sit toilet wall knees breakfast bad ham cheese bread otherwise staff helpful nice cleanthe hotel bad price location 1 2 nights staying hostel

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: aleka333
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights loved close tram explored city hotel red light district completely safe adequate yes theres steep staircase anticipated budget motels europe smoky cigarette smoky advertised nonsmoking overlooked canal nice view bedspread disgusting stained slightly stains bathroom looked afterthought barely walk toilet wall sink shower thin normalsized people showerhead rusty replacement didnt touch fear tetanus worse haha breakfast basic free researched online didnt policy keys hotel eight countries europe visited key day tried avoid heard horror stories getting robbed manager defensive lectured endlessly security feel secure hold onto own hotel key wouldnt pay lost complete morons fine policy announced booking didnt appreciate insecure manager waste bit time defending security staff etc mention americans saying crime able trust definitely hotel time amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “a home from home”
Reviews.Author: Lynne-Widnes
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel ideally placed getting near central station handy trams trains able lot staff friendly attentative feel welcome breakfast continental fresh replenished soon ran bedrooms basic clean ensuite bathroom bonus negative noisy guests run stairs 4am bad manners guests hotel definately stay consider absolute bargain

Reviews.Title: “Location EXCELLENT. Hotel condition POOR”
Reviews.Author: lacost69
Reviews.Content: stayed nights stag trip found hotel easily centraal station tried check 1030am told 2 hours hotel kept bags left near reception didnt entirely secure dont leave money passports etc walk hotel hotel isnt dirty extremely worn single run paint carpets stayed 5 bed top floor flight stairs extremely steep narrow beyond basic five single beds wardrobe barely holding tv strapped wall wet extremely heavy window onto rooftops poor view breakfast passed breakfast morning basically consisted eggs ham cheese etc instead eat local bulldog cafe nice english fresh towels day shower poor times dripped hot cold didnt clean dropped chips floor didnt realise day left rubbish accumulated left inside beside bin stay maybe cleaner ourselves expect cleaned hotel key handed reception matter time hotel location extremely close centraal station based red light district canal plenty bars shops restaurants late night takeaways doorstep mainly bulldog cafe cheapest pint lager 4 euros overall hotel friendly safe definitely lick paint money spending wouldnt recommend couples decent lads fine bed cheap superb location return maybe look alternatives location price hotels feature shadow doubt
